guidance:
- Is Amazon Macie enabled and running discovery jobs across all S3 buckets in your account ?
- Have you reviewed Macie findings to identify buckets containing sensitive data (e.g.: PII, credentials, financial data) that are publicly accessible or lack encryption ?
- Are Macie findings being reviewed regularly and actioned, rather than left unaddressed ?
how_to_check: [Macie.1] Amazon Macie should be enabled | Review the Macie console to confirm automated sensitive data discovery is active and check the Findings section for any unresolved sensitive data exposures across your S3 inventory
